titleStmt.title: A letter to a friend. Shewing, the illegall proceedings of the two houses of Parliament and observing God's aversenesse to their actions. Which caused the authours returne to the king and his alleagiance.
titleStmt.author: A. C.
Cowley, Abraham, 1618-1667, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
